I

ILSRequestAdaptor - Class in api
Most SIPRequest objects can only do a subset of all requests so this adaptor is used to screen out requests that don't make sense for the type of ILSRequestBuilder object.
ILSRequestAdaptor() - Constructor for class api.ILSRequestAdaptor
 
ILSRequestBuilder - Interface in api
ILSRequestBuilder outlines the contract that all implementers promise to fulfill.
init(DaemonContext) - Method in class mecard.MetroService

Allows the sip connection to be constructed with an institution id.
